Sentencas: The electrocatalytic activity of Pr-substituted cerium gadolinium oxide (CGO) was examined to assess its suitability as a composite air electrode in solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide

Sentencas: The solid-state reaction of CGO and Pr6O11 yielded fluorite-type solid solution, (Ce0.9Gd0.1)1-xPrxO2-delta (x = 0, 0.17 and 0.33), with an increased lattice parameter.
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide

Sentencas: Electrochemical tests of electrolyte-supported cells with CGO-PrOx and LSCF-CGO-PrOx electrodes exhibited that the PrOx addition significantly improves the electrical conductivity and electrocatalytic activity for oxygen reduction reaction (ORR).
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide

Sentencas: In-depth characterization showed that the improved ionic and electrical conductivities of CGO-PrOx are associated with high concentration of oxygen vacancies created by replacement of Ce4+ ions with Pr3+ ions.
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide

Sentencas: TEM analysis revealed that annealing of CGO-PrOx results in the exsolution of PrOx nanoparticles, indicating local lattice strain around Pr3+ and eventually their outward migration.
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide

Sentencas: TPD, TPR, and TPO measurements further demonstrated that CGO-PrOx has greater oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) activity at low temperatures (400-600 degrees C) when compared to CGO.
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide

Sentencas: These findings suggest the high potential of Pr-substituted CGO for low-temperature solid oxide cell applications.
Titulo: Enhanced Electrocatalytic Activity and Surface Exsolution in PrOx-Substituted Cerium Gadolinium Oxide
